items.title: Deep question
items.summary: This is the list of questions that makes me carry on. Why do we exist? Do People Have Free Will? Is Nature Moving Towards Dissolution Or Integration? What Gives Life Its Meaning? Why Do We Create Art? Does Time Have A Beginning Or An End?…
items.content_html:
This is the list of questions that makes me carry on. 

  1. Why do we exist? 

  2. Do People Have Free Will? 

  3. Is Nature Moving Towards Dissolution Or Integration?

  4. What Gives Life Its Meaning?

  5. Why Do We Create Art?

  6. Does Time Have A Beginning Or An End?

  7. Is Our Universe 'Real'?

  8. How Do You Explain Consciousness?

  9. What, Exactly, Makes You… You?

  10. If The Only Thing I Know Is That I Know Nothing, Do I Know Something?

  11.  If I Were Omnipotent, Could I Create A Rock So Heavy I Couldn't Lift It?

  12. If Every Cell In My Body Gets Replaced Over 7 Years, Will I Still Be Me In 7 Years?

  13. If No One Observes An Event, Did It Happen?

  14. Why is there something rather than nothing?

items.title: Different Story.
items.summary: Things we see will change if we tell ourselves a different story. We usually tell the story to ourselves, which makes us feel special, in the story in which everyone loves us. In which I am the one, everyone should care. We have justification for…
items.content_html:
Things we see will change if we tell ourselves a different story.

We usually tell the story to ourselves, which makes us feel special, in the story in which everyone loves us. In which I am the one, everyone should care.

Things we see will change if we tell ourselves a different story. 

We have justification for all the moves we have made. Sometimes we create false assumptions to justify our desires and the things we have done.

Things we see will change if we tell ourselves a different story. 

We made false exemptions to justify ourselves so we would be the good person in our story.

Things we see will change if we tell ourselves a different story. 
Things we see will change if we tell ourselves a different story. 
Things we see will change if we tell ourselves a different story.
